column7: User should get an alart of password should have at least 6 characters
column8:
Showing correctly "The 
password should have at least 6 characters"
column11:
Minimum of 1 lower case letter [a-z] and
Minimum of 1 upper case letter [A-Z] and
Minimum of 1 numeric character [0-9] and
Minimumof 1 special character: ~`!@#$%^&*()-_+={}[]|\;:"<>,./?
Passwords must be at least 8 characters in length, but can be much longer
It would have been better to give such a requirement
